pageProduct.name: Opti-Soothe Eye Lid Wipes 20 Wipes
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Opti-Soothe Preservative-Free Eyelid Wipes infused with Tea-Tree Oil, Hyaluronic Acid, Chamomile and Aloe Vera for daily eye hygiene

Warnings

Keep out of reach of children. Do not apply directly to the eye. Do not use if you have known allergies to any of the ingredients. For external use only.
Discontinue use if you experience any redness, itching or irritation and consult your Eye Care Specialist. Single use only. For ages 3 years+

Common Uses

Daily eyelid hygiene. Ideal for gentle cleansing and assists in the removal of debris and scurf from the eyelids.

Ingredients

Tea Tree Oil and Hyaluronic acid

Directions

Wash hands before use. Close eye and wipe gently and thoroughly across the eyelid and lashes several times in a side to side motion. Using a fresh wipe, repeat the process for the other eye.
